{{Actor| | type = Token | name = Accuracy upgrade | class = UpgradeAccuracy | game = Strife | convid = 307, 288, 308 }}[[Classes]]: {{Class|Inventory}}→{{Class|DummyStrifeItem}}→UpgradeAccuracy
This item... well, it does exactly what it says on the tin. It boosts your accuracy stat by 10 points. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR UpgradeAccuracy : {{Class|DummyStrifeItem}} native {}
